edu.biu.protocols.yao.offlineOnline.primitives

Class CommitmentBundleBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.protocols.yao.offlineOnline.primitives.CommitmentBundleBuilder

  • public class CommitmentBundleBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class builds the CommitmentBundle.

    Unlike the CommitmentBundle class (that is just a struct that hold data), this class also has functionality that creates the inline members.

    It contains a build function that Xors keys, commit on the keys, etc.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Asaf Cohen)
